description: When a dnsmasq pid is checked by linux_net, it only fails if there is no process running with the pid.  It does no verification that the pid actually refers to the proper process.
title: Nova-network fails to start dnsmasq if a pid has been reused

comments.content: When a dnsmasq pid is checked by linux_net, it only fails if there is no process running with the pid.  It does no verification that the pid actually refers to the proper process.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
